page.title: 13EDUCATION
page.content: There are three schools in our area. All our teachers are employed by Shropshire Education Committee.Our school Albrighton Junior School caters for children from the age of seven to the age of eleven.We have seven classes,three lower junior and four upper junior.We share the same site as Albrighton Infant School but each school has its own headteacher.We have extensive playing fields and our own outdoor heated swimming pool which we share with the Infant School and St.Mary's School.The village swimming club also use the pool at weekends and during the school holidays. St.Mary's Primary School is situated at the opposite end of the village and is a controlled Church school catering for children aged five to eleven.There is no provision in our area for secondary education.
